# Half

**ShaderGraph Node**

A constant half-precision floating-point numeric value.

## Parameter Types



## Nodes

- **Float**: A constant floating-point numeric value.
- **Color3 (Float)**: A constant Color3 (Float) value.
- **Color4 (Float)**: A constant Color4 (Float) value.
- **Vector2 (Float)**: A constant Vector2 (Float) value.
- **Vector3 (Float)**: A constant Vector3 (Float) value.
- **Vector4 (Float)**: A constant Vector4 (Float) value.
- **Boolean**: A constant boolean (true/false) value.
- **Integer**: A constant integer numeric value.
- **Matrix3x3 (Float)**: A constant Matrix3x3 (Float) value.
- **Matrix4x4 (Float)**: A constant Matrix4x4 (Float) value.
- **String**: A constant string (text) value.
- **Image File**: A constant path refering to an arbitrary image file on disk.
- **Vector2 (Half)**: A constant half-precision floating-point Vector2 numeric value.
- **Vector3 (Half)**: A constant half-precision floating-point Vector3 numeric value.
- **Vector4 (Half)**: A constant half-precision floating-point Vector4 numeric value.
